product_name: The North Face Venture Rain Pants - Women's
long_description: Stay dry during a sudden shower with the North Face Venture Rain pants for women; lightweight and compact material makes for easy stowing in a pack and when that shower hits you'll be totally ready. The Venture rain pants are a staple that every outdoor enthusiast will appreciate. HyVent(R) 2.5-layer fabric provides waterproof, highly breathable protection; a tri-component, multi-layer inner coating channels moisture outward away from body. HyVent is lightweight and packable, moves easily over layers and is more breathable than unlined, treated fabrics. All seams are sealed for complete protection. Personalize the fit with the elastic drawcord waist. 2 zip hand pockets; Venture pants roll up small and stow inside 1 hand pocket for easy transport.
short_description: Stay dry during a sudden shower with the North Face Venture Rain pants for women; lightweight and compact material makes for easy stowing in a pack and when that shower hits you'll be totally ready.
